AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Revian Orphan Child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: [PAWN_nameDef] was a street rat. [PAWN_possessive] parents were killed in the constant blood wars of Revia society, and [PAWN_pronoun] was taken in by an order of assassins. [PAWN_pronoun] learned much about how to wield blades as a result - and had plenty of practice.
